article_title: Alma Adams, Vince Coakley divided over Mel Watt’s U.S. District 12 seat
article_text: One of the starkest political divides this election season splits the firmly Democratic 12th Congressional District, the gerrymandered urban arc between Charlotte and Greensboro.
